content: the shell pieces when sewing pieces together sew through the front loops only of both piece see pictures once you have all but one shell piece sewn together take the last shell piece and sew only one side to the middle leave the other 2 sides not sewn your shell should now look like the images below also note it will make a bowl like shape when finished not completely flat page 9 next take your dark green yarn and 3 75mm hook attach yarn to the corner in 2sc space closest to the last hexagon piece you attached and single_crochet around the 4 shells to the other side ending in other 2 single_crochet space corner you will 2 single_crochet in each tip when single_crochet around don t crochet on sides between loose shell piece fo sew in ends take dark green yarn and attach to one corner in 2sc space of the loose shell single_crochet in same st as joining and next st chain 2 skip 2 spaces first button hole single_crochet in next st single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet in tip of shell single_crochet 6 chain 2 skip 2 second button hole single_crochet in next st and last chain 1 and turn slip_stitch across to first st where you joined fo sew in all ends shells done page 10 🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢🐢 place shell on top of turtle like shown flap above tail corners on each side of turtle this is how it will be sewn on use your light brown yarn and sew shell not into dark green trim starting 3 sts from the tail sew around body into the side of the belly stop when you have 3 sts left on other side of tail fo sew in ends take buttons and sew on either side of tail under the 3 stitchs spaces you skipped from last round that s it your done put baby turtles inside the mama turtle for storage when game isnt being played and use as a stuffed toy hope you enjoyed making this turtle game and hope the kids like playing it below are more pictures of my turtle and some turtles from my testers feel free to make it your own and change the colors some also stuffed the mama
